item.title: Work
item.description: About me Since almost 10 years I learn about and work in IT security. I study computer science with a focus on IT security and currently work in the Digital Security Lab at Reporters without Borders. For me it’s always a joyful activity when sharing my knowledge with others. For example during crypto partyies or in security workshops with activists and journalists. Besides my job at Reporters without Borders I work as a freelance IT security trainer.
